title: Develop Implementation Roadmap
description: After a strategy has been decided, an agent must create a phased implementation roadmap.

tasks.description: Break down the main strategic initiative into smaller, actionable workstreams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies logical workstreams like 'Technology Upgrade', 'Employee Training', and 'Process Redesign'.

tasks.description: For each workstream, define key milestones and estimated timelines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns realistic milestones and durations to each workstream.

tasks.description: Create a Gantt chart visualizing the roadmap, showing dependencies between workstreams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a Gantt chart that clearly shows the project plan over time.
